fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may accompany someone at night, learning all night feedback that your target receives.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target cannot be roleblocked or controlled and will have their visit Astral that night.
- You may accompany the Mafia.
- You cannot accompany the same person twice in a row.
- Roleblock and control immune
